[vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”2″ top_padding=”2″ bottom_padding=”0″ overlay_alpha=”95″ equal_height=”yes” gutter_size=”100″ shift_y=”0″ style=”inherited”][vc_column column_width_percent=”80″ overlay_alpha=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ align_medium=”align_center_tablet” medium_width=”0″ align_mobile=”align_center_mobile” shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ zoom_width=”0″ zoom_height=”0″ width=”1/1″ css=”.vc_custom_1485293643440{padding-right: 45px !important;padding-left: 45px !important;}”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ medium_width=”4″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ css_animation=”bottom-t-top” animation_delay=”200″ width=”1/1″][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”div” text_size=”h5″ text_height=”fontheight-357766″ text_space=”fontspace-210350″ text_font=”font-921308″ text_weight=”100″ text_transform=”uppercase” text_color=”color-124028″ css_animation=”alpha-anim” animation_delay=”200″]Who You Are.[/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text]You didn’t get to where you are by following an expected path. You follow your instincts, while everyone around you sits back and waits for life to happen. You are a catalyst, an agent of change. You’re smart, energetic, and aggressive. You possess an entrepreneurial spirit. You are inquisitive, innovative, and resourceful. You have a fresh perspective. Here at Mondo, we thrive on the kind of change that disrupts, rewrites the rules, and demands action at a moment’s notice. The core values that define us are MAP — Mentality, Accountability, and Process. MAP propels us forward and resilience sustains us. Think you have what it takes?

 

Key Traits We Look For:

Grit, Coachability, Solution-Oriented, Resilience, Challenge-Driven[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space empty_h=”2″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ medium_width=”4″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ css_animation=”bottom-t-top” animation_delay=”200″ width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”div” text_size=”h5″ text_height=”fontheight-357766″ text_space=”fontspace-210350″ text_font=”font-921308″ text_weight=”100″ text_transform=”uppercase” text_color=”accent”]Experience Required:[/vc_custom_heading][uncode_list icon=”fa fa-circle-check” icon_color=”accent”]

  • A motivated and tenacious individual with a passion for recruiting
  • The drive to succeed in a performance-driven culture
  • Desire to work with some of the world’s most innovative companies
  • The maturity and confidence to be a brand ambassador who reflects positively on the Mondo brand
  • Given our fast-paced environment, you are flexible, resourceful, and highly organized
  • You’re a roll-up-your-sleeves, jump-in, and get-it-done type of person

[/uncode_list][vc_empty_space empty_h=”2″ desktop_visibility=”yes” medium_visibility=”yes”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ medium_width=”4″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ css_animation=”bottom-t-top” animation_delay=”400″ width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”div” text_size=”h5″ text_height=”fontheight-357766″ text_space=”fontspace-210350″ text_font=”font-921308″ text_weight=”100″ text_transform=”uppercase” text_color=”accent”]Responsibilities of an Associate Technical Recruiter:[/vc_custom_heading][uncode_list icon=”fa fa-circle-check” icon_color=”accent”]

  • Identifying and developing potential candidates through cold calling prospects, networking, working with our extensive existing database, and utilizing website tools to generate new opportunities
  • Sourcing, recruiting, interviewing, and placing high-level IT, Tech, and Digital Marketing talent for contract and permanent opportunities with Mondo clients
  • Leveraging our resources to foster two-way engagement and communication with a diverse audience of talent professionals and industry influencers
  • Keeping a finger on the pulse of the industry: identifying opportunities, issues, strategies, and trends to help our business stay on the forefront of innovation
  • Working well within a fast-paced, dynamic environment with a high sense of urgency
  • Attending morning meetings designed to allow collaboration and communication between teams

[/uncode_list][vc_empty_space empty_h=”2″ desktop_visibility=”yes” medium_visibility=”yes”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space empty_h=”2″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ medium_width=”4″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ css_animation=”bottom-t-top” animation_delay=”200″ width=”1/1″][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”div” text_size=”h5″ text_height=”fontheight-357766″ text_space=”fontspace-210350″ text_font=”font-921308″ text_weight=”100″ text_transform=”uppercase” text_color=”color-124028″ css_animation=”alpha-anim” animation_delay=”200″]TL;DR? Here’s What To Expect.[/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text]A metrics-driven environment. You will be responsible for hitting set KPIs daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly. Your ramp-up period will be focused on establishing effective strategies to connect with high-end Tech and Digital Marketing experts through sourcing, cold-calling, and prospecting.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space empty_h=”2″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space empty_h=”1″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ medium_width=”4″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ css_animation=”bottom-t-top” animation_delay=”200″ width=”1/1″][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”div” text_size=”h5″ text_height=”fontheight-357766″ text_space=”fontspace-210350″ text_font=”font-921308″ text_weight=”100″ text_transform=”uppercase” text_color=”color-124028″ css_animation=”alpha-anim” animation_delay=”200″]Why Work For Us?[/vc_custom_heading][uncode_list icon=”fa fa-plus3″ icon_color=”accent”]

  • We prioritize autonomy. 
  • We provide professional development.
  • We value work-life balance.
  • We encourage personal growth.
  • Plus, we provide uncapped commission, competitive salaries, health benefits, and additional perks!

[/uncode_list][vc_column_text]You invest in us, we invest in you. It’s that simple.

Plus, you can’t beat our culture. Check us out on Instagram here and see for yourself![/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space empty_h=”3″ desktop_visibility=”yes” medium_visibility=”yes”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space empty_h=”5″][vc_empty_space empty_h=”3″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row unlock_row_content=”yes” row_height_percent=”0″ back_color=”color-gyho” overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ shift_y=”0″][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ position_vertical=”middle” align_horizontal=”align_center” overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ medium_width=”0″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ width=”1/1″][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”h1″ text_size=”” el_class=”.x-large-heading-apply scroll-fast”]

apply!

[/vc_custom_heading][vc_empty_space empty_h=”3″ medium_visibility=”yes” mobile_visibility=”yes”][vc_empty_space empty_h=”3″ medium_visibility=”yes” mobile_visibility=”yes”][vc_empty_space empty_h=”5″][vc_row_inner row_inner_height_percent=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ shift_y=”0″][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ medium_visibility=”yes” medium_width=”0″ mobile_visibility=”yes” shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ align_horizontal=”align_center” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ medium_width=”0″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”3″ width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1480695346063{padding-right: 45px !important;padding-left: 45px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”div” text_size=”h3″ text_height=”fontheight-524109″ text_font=”font-156269″ text_color=”color-prif” sub_reduced=”yes” css_animation=”alpha-anim” animation_delay=”200″]

Think you’re the right fit for Mondo Nation? Fill out the application below and we’ll contact you shortly.

[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ medium_visibility=”yes” medium_width=”0″ mobile_visibility=”yes” shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_raw_js][/vc_raw_js][vc_empty_space empty_h=”5″][vc_empty_space empty_h=”3″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
